Desc.entry: Private dual-registered care home for residential and Elderly Mentally Infirm (EMI) aged 65 years and over. 52 beds. Arranges regular day trips and holds a summer fair in August. Carries out activities during the week, including sing-a-longs and a visiting entertainer every month. Run by Redrose Care Ltd. This care home is registered and inspected by the Care Quality Commission (CQC), to make sure they provide a quality service.
